name: overlord
description: An Asset Creation Pipeline Management Tool for Daz Studio

scripts.clean: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const distPath = path.join(__dirname, 'dist'); if (fs.existsSync(distPath)) { fs.rmSync(distPath, { recursive: true, force: true }); console.log('Cleaned dist folder'); }"
scripts.postbuild: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const pkg = require('./package.json'); const version = pkg.version.replace(/\./g, '-'); const distPath = path.join(__dirname, 'dist'); const oldPath = path.join(distPath, `OverlordInstaller${pkg.version}.exe`); const newPath = path.join(distPath, `OverlordInstaller${version}.exe`); if (fs.existsSync(oldPath)) { fs.renameSync(oldPath, newPath); console.log(`Renamed to OverlordInstaller${version}.exe`); } const items = fs.readdirSync(distPath); items.forEach(item => { const itemPath = path.join(distPath, item); if (item !== `OverlordInstaller${version}.exe`) { const stat = fs.statSync(itemPath); if (stat.isDirectory()) { fs.rmSync(itemPath, { recursive: true, force: true }); } else { fs.unlinkSync(itemPath); } console.log(`Deleted: ${item}`); } }); console.log('Build complete! Installer ready.')"

author: Vineyard Technologies
